audio_sermons.title: Pursuing God's Presence
audio_sermons.description: Dr. Jim Shaddix from Riverside Baptist Church in Denver, Colorado. Dr. Shaddix will be speaking on Haggai 1:1-15. It is a fact that God dwells among His people but it is not a given that we will always experience Him functionally. The message of Haggai reminds us how we can.
